author: abdoulline
body:
#### PR description:

After expanded tests of a full new HCAL emap, it was found that some newly added HBX/HEX channels aren't packed properly in 10_6_0_pre4 (with  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26432) 

#### PR validation:

(1) runTheMatrix is OK;
(2) re-dumping of ASCII emap (packing/unpacking of pairs of HcalElectronicsId & HcalCalibDetId) show no issues.
title: HcalCalibDetId fix
